data.content: ğŸª¶Jab Dhadkano Ko Tham Leta Hai Koi, Jab Khayalo Mein Naam Hamara Leta Hai koi, ğŸ˜„ Yaade Tab aur Yaadgar Ban Jaati Hai, ğŸ˜™ğŸ˜™ Jab Hume Humse Behtar Jaan Leta Hai Koi.
Tu iss kadar mujhe apne kareeb lagta hai, ğŸ™‚ğŸ¤— Tujhe alag sochu to ajeeb lagta hai, ğŸ˜‘ Ye dosti ye chahate ye mohabat sab kya hai, ğŸ¤¨ Tu to mujzhe mera naseeb lagta hai. ğŸ˜

Kuch rahe na rahe teri mohabbat ka sahara rahe, ğŸ¤¨ğŸª¶ Pyar main dooba, hamesha ye dil hamara rahe, ğŸ˜„ğŸ¤— Khushian teri, saare ghum mere ho dua yahi hai, ğŸ˜„ Ankhoon mein sada chehra tumhara rahe.
Beshak wo nahi karti baat, ğŸ¤” Fir bhi unse milne ko dil bekrar kyu hai, ğŸ¤” Unki yaad to ab raat ko sone bhi nahi deti, ğŸ¤” Jaane humko unse itna pyar kyun hai.

Kacchi deewaar hu thokar na lagana mujhko, ğŸ˜ Apni najro mein basakar na girana mujhko, ğŸ˜¶â€ğŸŒ«ï¸ Tumko aankhon mein tasveer ki tarah rakhta hu, ğŸ˜ Dil mein dhadkan ki tarah tum bhi basana mujhko.
Main khush hu ki mujhe mera pyaar mil gaya, ğŸ¤” Kareeb ghar ke hi mujhe mera Yaar mil gaya, ğŸ¤” Karu na naaz kyon main apni kismat par, ğŸ¤” Chand se bhi haseen mujh ko deedaar mil gaya.
Meri Guftagu Ke Har Andaaz Ko Samjhta Hai, ğŸ˜• Ek Wo hi Hai Jo Mujh pe eitmaad Rakhta Hai, ğŸ˜• Door Hoke Bhi Mujhse Hai Wo Itna Kareeb, ğŸ˜• Aisa Lagta Hai Mere Aas-Pass Rehta Hai.
Kuch Lamhe Aur Uska Sath Chahta Tha, ğŸ˜¶ Ankho Mein Thami Wo Barsat Chahta Tha, ğŸ˜¶ Janta Hu Bohat Chahti Thi Wo Magar, ğŸ˜¶ Uski Zuban Se ek dafa Izhaar Chahta tha.

ğŸ§ Wo Aksar Humse Poochte The.. Zindagi Kya Or Maut Kya Hai?? Hum Dil Hi Dil Mein Kehte The, ğŸ§ Tujhe Paa Liya To Zindagi, Tujhe Kho Diye
